title: Stainless Steel Refrigerator, Wet Bar, Ceiling Fans
posting_body: ['Evoq Apartments encompasses the best of the Las Vegas Strip all in one convenient, modern, and central location.', 'Enjoy a storied neighborhood, engaging culture, and unique living accommodations in an unbeatable location just a block from the most luxurious Hotels and Casinos in the World.', '-Locker Rooms', '-Grey Subway Tile Kitchen Backsplashes', '-Hardwood Floors', '-On-Site Courtesy Patrol', '-Marbled Tile Bath Enclosures', '-Stainless Steel Multi-Cycle Dishwasher', '-Entertainers', 'Clubhouse with TV Area, Modern Community kitchen, Billiards, Baby Grand Piano', '-A Block from Las Vegas Strip', '-Glossy', 'Two Toned Grey / White Flat Panel Cabinetry', '-Three Resort-Style Pools, Including Spa, Cabanas, and Fire Pit', '-Well Beats Personal Fitness Classes', '-White Quartz Countertops', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>', '*Equal housing opportunity*']
